i18nHelper Maven Mojo

i18nHelper Maven Mojo
Parent Project

Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

i18nHelper:pull

Full name:

com.summit:i18nHelper:0.1.2-SNAPSHOT:pull

Description:

Goal that generates a single properties file from i18n properties bundles.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
bundleLocations FileSet[] - Places to look for bundles
outputDirectory File - Location of the file.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}.
outputFileName String - Output File name.
Default value is: i18nHelper.properties.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
languageCode String - If set, this code will override languageCodes. This helps in creation of a single language template file.
languageCodes List - Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file
removeWhiteSpace boolean - If set to true, will remove whitespace from the properties.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

bundleLocations:

Places to look for bundles
  • Type: org.apache.maven.shared.model.fileset.FileSet[]
  • Required: Yes

languageCode:

If set, this code will override languageCodes. This helps in creation of a single language template file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.language}

languageCodes:

Languages codes to include in the pull, these will be added to the generated file. File output will be a java properties file
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

outputDirectory:

Location of the file.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}

outputFileName:

Output File name.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.pullfile}
  • Default: i18nHelper.properties

removeWhiteSpace:

If set to true, will remove whitespace from the properties.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${i18nHelper.removeWhiteSpace}
  • Default: false
